issues.message: Delete this unreachable code or refactor the code to make it reachable.
Remove 1 unexpected arguments; 'warn' expects 1 positional arguments.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal u"some_defined_thing is defined" 3 times.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator ">=".
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal '{{ dict_value }}' 7 times.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator "<=".
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal u"hostvars['some_host'] is defined" 3 times.
Correct one of the identical sub-expressions on both sides of operator ">".
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal u"some_defined_thing is undefined" 3 times.
